constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 141 (Friday, August 6, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JEFFRIES:
H.R. 4958.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 Clause 18
[Page H4320]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: September 11 Transparency Act of 2021
